data.head: https://akmweb.youngjoygame.com/web/svnres/img/mlbb/homepage/100_d1d055377612e96139f2f2ae5d0c3279.png

skilllist.skilldesc:
Kimmy can move and aim in different directions when using her Spray Gun, but cannot lock onto a specific enemy. Kimmy's Spray Gun attack restores 5 energy on hit and deals <font color="fba51f"> (+22% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="62f8fe">(+24% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> per bullet (increases by 1% for every hero level). 

Kimmy can move while shooting but cannot gain extra Attack Speed. Instead, every 10% Attack Speed she receives will be converted into 5 Movement Speed. Kimmy restores 15 energy each time she kills an enemy.

<font color="a6aafb">Hold</font>: Kimmy continuously shoots Chemical Bolts in the target direction, each bolt consuming 4 energy and dealing 20<font color="fba51f"> (+22% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="62f8fe">(+24% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> to the enemy hit. Chemical Bolts that fail to hit an enemy will explode at the end of their paths, dealing the same amount of damage to nearby enemies.
The Chemical Bolts can Crit.

Kimmy shoots out enhanced Chemical Spray and recoils in the opposite direction. Enemies that come into contact with the Spray left on the path will take 14<font color="fba51f"> (+30% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="62f8fe">(+40% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> every 0.5s and be slowed by 40% for 4s.
Kimmy also restores 30 energy upon casting this skill.

After a period of charging, Kimmy launches a Luminous Chemical Attack in a designated direction. The projectile will explode upon hitting an enemy or reaching the maximum range, dealing 130<font color="fba51f"> (+100% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="62f8fe">(+115% Total Magic Power)</font>-238<font color="fba51f"> (+185% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="62f8fe">(+211% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> to the primary target (scales with charging time) and 83% damage to nearby enemies.

data.name: Kimmy

__data.skilldesc:
Deal 520 (+80*Hero Level) <font color="ffe63c">True Damage</font> to the target Creep or Minion.
<font color="62f8fe">Passive</font>: Increases Creep rewards by 60% and reduces damage taken from basic Creeps by 40%. Also grants 15% additional Damage Reduction in the allied jungle during the first 2 min. Cannot share Minion rewards with allied heroes in the first 5 min.
<font color="62f8fe">Blessing:</font> Accumulate 5 Creep kills, hero kills, or assists to upgrade the spell according to the Jungling Boots' Blessing, and <Num9> kills or assists to gain <Num10> Physical Attack and Magic Power and <Num11> Max HP.
__data.skilldesc_text: Deal <Num1> [C5True Damage] to the target Creep or Minion.####[C2Passive]: Increases Creep rewards by <%Num2> and reduces damage taken from basic Creeps by <%Num3>. Also grants <%Num5> additional Damage Reduction in the allied jungle during the first <Num4> min. Cannot share Minion rewards with allied heroes in the first <Num6> min.####[C2Blessing:] Accumulate <Num8> Creep kills, hero kills, or assists to upgrade the spell according to the Jungling Boots' Blessing, and <Num9> kills or assists to gain <Num10> Physical Attack and Magic Power and <Num11> Max HP.
__data.skilldescemblem:
Deal 520 (+80*Hero Level) <font color="ffe63c">True Damage</font> to the target Creep or Minion.
<font color="62f8fe">Passive</font>: Increases Creep rewards by 60% and reduces damage taken from basic Creeps by 40%. Also grants 15% additional Damage Reduction in the allied jungle during the first 2 min. Cannot share Minion rewards with allied heroes in the first 5 min.
<font color="62f8fe">Blessing:</font> Accumulate 5 Creep kills, hero kills, or assists to upgrade the spell according to the Jungling Boots' Blessing, and <Num9> kills or assists to gain <Num10> Physical Attack and Magic Power and <Num11> Max HP.

recommendmasterplan.description: Jungle: Each bullet deals massive damage. Pew pew!

emblemattr.emblemattr:
+14 Adaptive Penetration
+10 Adaptive Attack
+3% Movement Speed

emblemskill.skilldesc:
Gain 5 <font color="ffdfa2">Adaptive Penetration</font>.

<font color="8098ab">Gain Physical Penetration if extra Physical Attack is higher than extra Magic Power; otherwise, gain Magic Penetration.</font>
emblemskill.skilldesc_text: Gain <Num1> [ffdfa2]Adaptive Penetration[-].########[8098ab]Gain Physical Penetration if extra Physical Attack is higher than extra Magic Power; otherwise, gain Magic Penetration.[-]
emblemskill.skilldescemblem:
Gain 5 <font color="ffdfa2">Adaptive Penetration</font>.

<font color="8098ab">Gain Physical Penetration if extra Physical Attack is higher than extra Magic Power; otherwise, gain Magic Penetration.</font>

emblemskill.skilldesc: Damage against Lord and Turtle is increased by 15%. This bonus is halved against regular Creeps and doesn't affect the damage of Retribution.
emblemskill.skilldesc_text: Damage against Lord and Turtle is increased by <%Num1>. This bonus is halved against regular Creeps and doesn't affect the damage of Retribution.
emblemskill.skilldescemblem: Damage against Lord and Turtle is increased by 15%. This bonus is halved against regular Creeps and doesn't affect the damage of Retribution.

emblemskill.skilldesc:
Dealing damage with skills deals 4% of target's Max HP as extra <font color="ffdfa2">Adaptive Damage</font> and restores 2% Mana on hit.

<font color="8098ab">If the hero does not use Mana, recovers 1% HP instead. The extra Adaptive Damage dealt to non-hero units is up to 120</font>.

<font color="8098ab">Cooldown: 5s</font>
emblemskill.skilldesc_text: Dealing damage with skills deals <%Num1> of target's Max HP as extra [ffdfa2]Adaptive Damage[-] and restores <%Num2> Mana on hit.########[8098ab]If the hero does not use Mana, recovers <%Num4> HP instead. The extra Adaptive Damage dealt to non-hero units is up to <Num5>[-].########[8098ab]Cooldown: <Num3>s[-]
emblemskill.skilldescemblem:
Dealing damage with skills deals 4% of target's Max HP as extra <font color="ffdfa2">Adaptive Damage</font> and restores 2% Mana on hit.

<font color="8098ab">If the hero does not use Mana, recovers 1% HP instead. The extra Adaptive Damage dealt to non-hero units is up to 120</font>.

<font color="8098ab">Cooldown: 5s</font>

equiplist.equipskill1: Hunter: After dealing damage to a Creep, deal 25(+3*Hero Level) + (+0.01 Total HP) True Damage to the target over 3s (damage is increased by 100% for non-Marksmen heroes).
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Hunter: After dealing damage to a Creep, deal 25(+3*Hero Level) + (+0.01 Total HP) True Damage to the target over 3s (damage is increased by 100% for non-Marksmen heroes).

equiplist.equipskill1: Ice Bound: When a skill deals damage to an enemy hero, it will also slow them by 10% for 2s (stacks up to 3 times). This effect has a 1s cooldown.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Ice Bound: When a skill deals damage to an enemy hero, it will also slow them by 10% for 2s (stacks up to 3 times). This effect has a 1s cooldown.
equiplist.equiptips:
+75 Magic Power
+10% Spell Vamp
+300 Extra Max HP
+7% Movement Speed

equiplist.equipskill1: Magic: Dealing Magic Damage to enemy heroes will reduce their Magic Defense by 3(+0.3*Hero Level) for 2s. Stacks up to 3 times.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Magic: Dealing Magic Damage to enemy heroes will reduce their Magic Defense by 3(+0.3*Hero Level) for 2s. Stacks up to 3 times.

equiplist.equipskill1: Scorch: Dealing Magic Damage burns the targets for 3s, also dealing extra Magic Damage equal to 1% of the target's Max HP per second.
equiplist.equipskill2: Lifebane: Dealing damage to a target will reduce the Shield and HP Regen effects on them to 50% of normal for 3s.
equiplist.equipskilldesc:
Scorch: Dealing Magic Damage burns the targets for 3s, also dealing extra Magic Damage equal to 1% of the target's Max HP per second.
Lifebane: Dealing damage to a target will reduce the Shield and HP Regen effects on them to 50% of normal for 3s.
equiplist.equiptips:
+75 Magic Power
+400 Extra Max HP
+5% Movement Speed

equiplist.equipskill1: Doom: Critical strikes grant 5% extra Physical Attack for 2s.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Doom: Critical strikes grant 5% extra Physical Attack for 2s.
equiplist.equiptips:
+40% Crit Damage
+65 Extra Physical Attack
+25% Crit Chance

equiplist.equipskill1: Spellbreaker: When attacking an enemy, gains 0.1% extra Magic Penetration for each point of the enemy's Magic Defense, capped at 20%.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Spellbreaker: When attacking an enemy, gains 0.1% extra Magic Penetration for each point of the enemy's Magic Defense, capped at 20%.

recommendmasterplan.name: Uncle Chikanook Gamer
recommendmasterplan.title: Influencer

data.story: A cool girl who loves technology and invention.

assist.desc: Kimmy works well with heroes who can boost her Movement Speed, such as Rafaela and Angela, because they can profoundly increase her kiting ability.

strong.desc: Kimmy counters Tanks that lack mobility, such as Hylos and Carmilla, because she can damage them easily while maintaining a safe distance.

weak.desc: Kimmy is countered by Assassins with high burst damage like Natalia and Aamon since her mobility is not enough to escape them and she falls easily to burst damage.
